body_html: @ebrevdo: Want to comment on this? Fancier variants of LSTMs would be great to have, the only question is whether they should go in core tensorflow, the contrib directory, or the models repo. If you can make the interface similar to Eugene's existing RNN cell setup contrib might be the best place at first.
